last_episode_to_air.name: The Squatchland
last_episode_to_air.overview: The team travels to Iowa to investigate Yellow River State Forest's history of reports; the local BFRO share stories around the campfire, and the team explores the park, leading to an epic final night, and a squatch.

name: Finding Bigfoot
overview: From small towns in the South to remote areas of the Pacific Northwest and Alaska, four eccentric but passionate members of the Bigfoot Field Research Organization (BFRO) embark on one single-minded mission - to find the elusive "creature" known as Bigfoot or the Sasquatch.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Crossing in Georgia
episodes.overview: Famed Bigfoot investigator Matt Moneymaker and his team of Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization (BFRO) experts travel to the forests of northern Georgia to examine footage of what they believe is a Bigfoot running across the road.

episodes.name: Swamp Ape
episodes.overview: Bigfoot expert Matt Moneymaker takes his team to northern Florida to help a family that believes they have a Bigfoot living on their property. The team meets with members of the Seminole nation, whose history with the creature allegedly goes back hundreds of years.

episodes.name: Caught on Tape
episodes.overview: From deep inside the North Carolina Uhwarrie National Forest comes one of the most convincing pieces of Bigfoot footage from the past 40 years. The team of BFRO investigators use decades worth of experiences to determine if this footage is the real deal.

episodes.name: Fishing for Bigfoot in Oregon
episodes.overview: Bigfoot expert Matt Moneymaker takes his team of specialists to Oregon to examine a video taken on a rafting expedition. While investigating, the BFRO team hears a sound in the middle of the night that they believe could prove the creature's existence.

episodes.name: Frozen Bigfoot
episodes.overview: Famed Bigfoot expert Matt Moneymaker and his team of Bigfoot investigators journey into the mountains of southern Washington to explore a series of photos that depict what some believe is a Bigfoot on a snowy peak.

episodes.name: Alaska's Bigfoot Island
episodes.overview: A call from a concerned mayor brings Matt Moneymaker and his team of Bigfoot experts to the island of Prince of Wales, Alaska. The island allegedly has a long history with the beast, and a recent spike in reported activity has the townspeople on edge.

episodes.name: Baby Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The bigfoot research team heads to New York to investigate video of an alleged baby bigfoot. When locals report bigfoot activity in the neighboring woods, the teams tries a new search method in hopes of finding bigfoots near the Big Apple.

episodes.name: Big Rhodey
episodes.overview: The bigfoot research team go to Rhode Island to examine video of a roadside sighting of a bigfoot. They learn that this unexplored area has a wealth of sasquatch activity and hope to prove that this small state is hiding bigfoots.

episodes.name: Peeping Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The bigfoot research team heads to Minnesota to investigate intriguing howls recorded at an infamous bigfoot hotspot. They go deep into the wild, hot on the trail of bigfoots rumored to be bigger and bolder than any other on earth.

episodes.name: Canadian Bigfoot, Eh?
episodes.overview: The bigfoot research team travels to Canada to investigate a unique bigfoot encounter caught on tape. The team zeroes in on the Canadian Rockies is search of what may be the most territorial sasquatches on earth.

episodes.name: Buckeye Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team travels to Ohio to investigate an alleged close encounter with a bigfoot caught on tape. They assemble a group of volunteers to search a notorious forest for evidence, in hopes of proving bigfoots exist in Ohio.

episodes.name: Virginia Is for Bigfoot Lovers
episodes.overview: The bigfoot research team heads to Virginia to investigate video the locals are dubbing "The Beast of Gumhill." With new reports from the town hall meeting, the team uses a unique search technique to prove this elusive beast is real.

episodes.name: Moonshine and Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team travels to Kentucky to investigate a piece of footage that seems to show the glowing eyes of a bigfoot. With locals reporting activity in Daniel Boone National Forest, the team tries a new search technique to see there really are bigfoots in Kentucky.

episodes.name: Hoosier Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team travels to Indiana to investigate footage that purports to show a bigfoot in daylight. With sightings reported around Morgan-Monroe State Forest, the team lights up the sky in a new technique, to prove bigfoots do call the Hoosier state home.

episodes.name: Holy Cow, It's Bigfoot
episodes.overview: A mysterious video and reports from Utah State University help the team to determine that bigfoots have lived in the mountainous state for decades. Hoping to corner a squatch, they invite a witness to help in their final night investigation.

episodes.name: Bobo Marks His Turf
episodes.overview: Video of an alleged Bigfoot taken with a thermal-imaging camera in New Mexico's Jemez Mountains leads the team to search the Valles Caldera National Preserve from a hot-air balloon.

episodes.name: Ripped from the Headlines
episodes.overview: In the Season 3 premiere, the Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization team head to Idaho to examine video footage that has attracted attention from national media outlets, and unveil a baiting technique to find out if the reports are true.

episodes.name: Mother Bigfoot
episodes.overview: A photo that allegedly shows a Bigfoot carrying her baby is investigated in an apple orchard in Vermont.

episodes.name: CSI Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team is in central Oklahoma for what may be their big break. Recent physical evidence has turned up and it may actually be bigfoot DNA. The investigators interview witnesses in the area and learn that there are several reporter sightings near local waterways. The team deploys a stealth technique they believe may prove that sasquatches do indeed live just miles from Oklahoma City.

episodes.name: The Sierra Spy
episodes.overview: The Sierra Nevada Mountains of California are a hot spot for bigfoot activity, and the team is travelling near Fresno to investigate multiple sightings. The investigators visit with a local Native American tribe that confirms that sasquatches have inhabited the mountain region for centuries. With the reaffirmation from the Native American tribe, the team is determined to locate a sasquatch and attempts to cash in on the curiosity of these mysterious creatures by breaking out a relic from the past that they believe can prove bigfoots run wild in the Golden State.

episodes.name: Dances with Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team is in Arizona's Mogollon Rim to investigate sightings of what locals have described as a bigfoot. Before launching a full-on investigation, the team searches for clues that Arizona's habitat could support these elusive creatures, and they come across what may be a training ground for juvenile sasquatches. Then, with help from a local Apache Indian tribe, the team sets out to prove bigfoots do call Arizona home.

episodes.name: Bigfoot and Wolverines
episodes.overview: The Finding Bigfoot team has traveled to Michigan to investigate a promising message left on the BFRO hotline. With a wealth of recent reports from this area, the team takes to the woods in one their most successful night investigations ever.

episodes.name: Bobo Marks His Turf
episodes.overview: New Mexico is dubbed the "Land of Enchantment," and the team is in the Jemez Mountains to investigate a thermal video image captured during a Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization (BFRO) expedition. Through the testimonials of local eyewitnesses, the team discovers that this particular bigfoot may be residing in the Valles Caldera, a National Park which hosts vast herds of elk. Forested canyons surround the park, and the team of investigators believes itâs found the perfect habitat for the world's largest and most mysterious apex predator. In a stealthy attempt to pinpoint this elusive beast, the team takes to the friendly skies via a hot air balloon.

episodes.name: Australian Yowie
episodes.overview: The team takes an unprecedented trip across the globe to investigate recent eyewitness reports of yowies terrorizing locals in Australia's Gold Coast. Yowies are mysterious creatures described as bipedal, apex predators with brown fur, and the team must use their sasquatch expertise to track down where these creatures may be. With help from local witnesses and experts, the investigators traverse deep into Australia's jungle in hopes of proving bigfoot's cousin down under is in fact real.

episodes.name: Squatch Spies
episodes.overview: Reports of howls in Washington state by local Bigfoot researchers give the team a chance to use its high-tech thermal equipment to investigate.

episodes.name: Bacon for Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The mayor of a small town in Louisiana calls upon the bigfoot team to investigate unusual activity in his community. To lure in these mysterious creatures, the team deploys a new baiting technique and discovers convincing evidence themselves.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Merit Badge
episodes.overview: The team travels to CO to investigate footage of a possible bigfoot, predating the famous Patterson-Gimlin film by five years. They narrow down their search grid and call upon the aid of a Girl Scout troop to help bait a bigfoot.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Hoedown
episodes.overview: The team travels to WV to investigate photographs from a young bigfooter that may depict a sasquatch in his own backyard. The team sets out to get their own photographic proof and deploys a baiting technique not for the faint of heart.

episodes.name: Badlands Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team meets with witnesses from the Lakota Sioux, who claim Bigfoots roam the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation. After zeroing in on a hot spot, the team is granted special access to private land where they just might find the Lakota's legendary Tall Man.

episodes.name: Indonesia's Little Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The Finding Bigfoot team journeys to the Kerinci region on the island of Sumatra in search of Indonesia's elusive Orang Pendek, venturing into the unfamiliar jungle in hopes of proving this mythical creature is in fact real.

episodes.name: Peek-A-Boo Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team travels to the Great Smokies of TN to investigate trail camera photos that may show a sasquatch living in these mountains. After witnesses share stories, the team enlists the aid of professional hog callers to try and bait a hungry bigfoot.

episodes.name: Bigfoot and the Redhead
episodes.overview: The team travels to PA to meet with teenagers who may have filmed a bigfoot while riding go-karts. A packed town hall leads them to the Allegheny National Forest, where they deploy a unique search technique to try and elicit a response from a bigfoot.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Loves a Barbeque
episodes.overview: The team travels to CT to investigate a video of a possible bigfoot captured by a mother recording her children at play. In one of the most populated states, they meet with locals and set up a bait trap in hopes of luring in any hungry bigfoots.

episodes.name: Virgin Sasquatch
episodes.overview: The team returns to Oregon to investigate a record amount of bigfoot tracks originally cast and documented by Cliff. As they zero in on a recent hotspot, the team deploys a dangerous technique to increase their odds of capturing this elusive creature.

episodes.name: Bigfoot the Friendly Ghost
episodes.overview: The team go to Illinois to investigate a man's alleged recordings of Bigfoot howls, and interview residents who claim to have seen the beasts in unusual places, including a cemetery.

episodes.name: Heart of Squatchness
episodes.overview: The team go to Vietnam to search for the Wildman, a hairy, bipedal beast allegedly similar to Bigfoot that has been the subject of reported sightings deep in the jungle.

episodes.name: The Legend of Boggy Creek
episodes.overview: The team travels to Fouke, Arkansas, home of the 1972 Bigfoot documentary, "The Legend of Boggy Creek." With a long history of sightings near this small town, the team takes to the surrounding swamps in hopes of proving Arkansas' Bigfoot is more than just legend.

episodes.name: Surf's Up Sasquatch
episodes.overview: The team travels to Santa Cruz to visit the Bigfoot Discovery Museum. The museum's owner directs them to recent eyewitnesses and secret hotspots. Bobo hopes the smells from an authentic Hawaiian luau will be too much for nearby bigfoots to resist

episodes.name: Best Evidence Yet
episodes.overview: The team returns to Florida to investigate thermal footage of a possible bigfoot. Convinced of the evidence, they revisit witnesses from previous expeditions and narrow their search to a recent hotspot.

episodes.name: Kung-Fu Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team travels to China in search of the Yeren, a bi-pedal, hair-covered ape similar to bigfoot. Little is known about this elusive creature, but the team uses their bigfooting skills to try and prove Chinaâs Yeren is more than just legend.

episodes.name: Sketching Sasquatch
episodes.overview: An alleged audio recording of a Bigfoot is investigated near Lake Tahoe along the California-Nevada border in the Sierra Nevada mountains, where the team split up to cover more ground and interview as many witnesses as possible.

episodes.name: Lonestar Sasquatch
episodes.overview: The team travels to Eastern Texas to investigate thermal footage that may show a Bigfoot spying on a campsite. Convinced by the evidence, they enlist the aid of primate tracking dogs in hopes of proving Bigfoots do roam the Lonestar State.

episodes.name: Abominable Snowman
episodes.overview: The team from Finding Bigfoot travel around the world to Nepal in search of the infamous Yeti. They visit monasteries with Yeti relics, talk to firsthand witnesses and travel into the dense forests of the Himalayas. Will they succeed in finding evidence?

episodes.name: Big Sky Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team travels to big sky country to investigate sasquatch activity near the city of Bozeman, MT. After meeting witnesses, they enlist the aid of a dog sled team to take them into a nearby valley, where they set up a fake deer trap to lure a bigfoot.

episodes.name: Bigfoot of Oz
episodes.overview: The team go to Kansas to see if they can find evidence of Bigfoot activity on the plains, and narrow their search to waterways outside of Wichita, where they try aerial reconnaissance and employ a unique baiting technique.

episodes.name: Super Yooper Sasquatch
episodes.overview: The team travels to the Upper Peninsula of Michigan to investigate a photo of a sasquatch. With witnesses in this region claiming bigfoots have been stalking them, the team deploys a U.P. delicacy in hopes a sasquatch has the same appetite as the locals.

episodes.name: South Jersey Sasquatch
episodes.overview: The team visits the Garden State for the first time. After their successful night investigation, they hold a town hall meeting to gather more witnesses. The team investigates a refuge that used to be a cranberry bog trying to prove bigfoots live in NJ.

episodes.name: Coal Miner's Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team travels back to West Virginia to investigate recent recordings of possible bigfoot howls. With the help of a radio show, the team reaches out to witnesses from across the state and rafts deep into the holler in hopes of finding a bigfoot.

episodes.name: 1, 2, 3, 4, I Declare a Squatch War
episodes.overview: The team travels back to the Pacific Northwest to determine the squatchiest state in the U.S. With the team evenly divided and a friendly wager made, Bobo and Cliff head to Oregon while Matt and Ranae head to Washington to see which state is squatchier.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Call of the Wildman
episodes.overview: In the season five premiere, the team go to Kentucky to inspect casts of alleged Bigfoot tracks, and spend some with Ernie Brown Jr., aka Turtleman, who recalls a chilling childhood encounter with a mysterious beast.

episodes.name: Squatters for Sasquatch
episodes.overview: The team arrive in Virginia as hunting season is about to begin, and hope their Bigfoot decoy will attract a beast that was allegedly photographed by a trail camera.

episodes.name: Beast of the Bayou
episodes.overview: The team return to Louisiana to examine a photo of an alleged Bigfoot taken by a trail camera, and later explore a national forest with help from a local drum line.

episodes.name: Squatching in a Winter Wonderland
episodes.overview: A trip to Washington state to investigate 50 years of alleged Bigfoot sightings in the Blue Mountains includes a meeting with anthropology professor Jeff Meldrum of Idaho State University.

episodes.name: Live to Squatch Another Day
episodes.overview: The team's search in Oklahoma appears to yield positive results with the use of a cherry picker and some music to spot a Bigfoot, but they also find themselves in danger on their last night in the state.

episodes.name: 'Bama Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team go to Alabama to explore the forests of an area the locals call Creepy Mountain, where they design a special search technique after examining thermal footage.

episodes.name: Bobo's Backyard
episodes.overview: The team go to California to investigate unusual photographs taken in a Redwood forest not far from Bobo's home in Humboldt County.

episodes.name: Biggest Search Yet
episodes.overview: The team split up at the Four Corners Monument to explore the southwestern U.S. states of Arizona, Colorado, New Mexico and Utah.

episodes.name: Paranormal Squatchitivity
episodes.overview: The team trek to the haunted forests of Pennsylvania to investigate possible sasquatch and specter sightings.

episodes.name: Atomic Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team goes to eastern Tennessee and quickly discover the area is shrouded in mystery.

episodes.name: Squatching in the Midnight Sun
episodes.overview: The team splits up to cover more ground when they head to Alaska and investigate two areas separated by 500 miles of untamed wilderness; Cliff's hunch of an 'extra squatchy' area has everyone regrouping for a final push deeper into the woods.

episodes.name: Baked Potato Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The team are in Idaho to investigate alleged Bigfoot activity in the state's panhandle, and enlist a secondary scout team to help with the search.

episodes.name: Squatchers Take New Jersey
episodes.overview: The team return to New Jersey in this 2 hour episode to investigate the legend of Big Red Eye and attend a town-hall meeting. Also: Cliff goes on a search with comedian Bobcat Goldthwait.

episodes.name: British Bigfoot
episodes.overview: Bobo and Cliff go to Scotland to investigate possible sightings near Loch Ness, while Matt and Ranae look for evidence farther south in England when the team go to the United Kingdom.

episodes.name: Matt Goes Home
episodes.overview: The team travels to Ohio, to investigate the location where Matt had his first face-to-face encounter with a sasquatch.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Basecamp
episodes.overview: The team go to Minnesota to examine photos of unusually large footprints taken by the manager of a rural resort, so they set up a home base in a nearby cabin and install surveillance cameras.

episodes.name: Paranormal Squatchtivity
episodes.overview: The team travels to the eerie woods of Pennsylvania to investigate haunted forests that might be home to both sasquatch and specters.

episodes.name: Turtleman's Bigfoot
episodes.overview: The investigators travel once more to the state of Kentucky to inspect some recent casts of bigfoot tracks. After a wild night with Ernie the Turtleman, they have a terrifying night of their own using Louisville Sluggers for knockers.

episodes.name: Amazon Squatchin'
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, the team explore the Amazon River basin in search of the mapinguari, an ape-like creature that, according to folklore, has one eye and a second mouth on its stomach.

episodes.name: Squatchin' in the Sunshine State
episodes.overview: The team meet witnesses with a spooky video in Florida as they join local expert Stacy Brown Jr. in the infamous Myakka River State Park.

episodes.name: The Secret Squatch Spot
episodes.overview: The team heads to South Carolina and split up to investigate a video of an active strange track-way area.

episodes.name: Squatchsploitation
episodes.overview: The team returns to Louisiana to investigate a Bigfoot hot spot, Caddo Lake. After the team reminisces about the 1970s monster films shot at this location, they meet with witnesses and finally head out on an eventful night investigation on the bayou.

episodes.name: A Squatch in the Ozarks
episodes.overview: The team treks into Ozark hollows in search of a Sasquatch known locally as the legendary Blue Man.

episodes.name: The Best Little Bigfoot in Texas
episodes.overview: The team return to Texas to examine new evidence of a trackway they believe may have been made by a juvenile Bigfoot.

episodes.name: Bigfoot State of Mind
episodes.overview: It's off to the Adirondacks of New York to investigate recent reports in Whitehall.

8.status_message: The resource you requested could not be found.
